mapper.insert: insert into question (subjectCode, examName, qNumber, qInfo, ex1, ex2, ex3, ex4, qPoint, answer) values (#{subjectCode}, #{examName}, #{qNumber}, #{qInfo}, #{ex1}, #{ex2}, #{ex3}, #{ex4}, #{qPoint}, #{answer})
mapper.update: update question set qInfo=#{qInfo}, ex1=#{ex1}, ex2=#{ex2}, ex3=#{ex3},ex4=#{ex4}, qPoint=#{qPoint}, answer=#{answer} where subjectCode=#{subjectCode} and examName=#{examName} and qNumber=#{qNumber}
mapper.select: select qNumber, qInfo, ex1, ex2, ex3, ex4, qPoint, answer from question where subjectCode=#{subjectCode} and examName=#{examName} order by qNumber
